content: create a modern plaid corner-to-corner crochet blanket with the kensington throw using two colors and an addictive technique you ll have a beautiful and warm blanket in no time perfect for snuggling up on a chilly day pattern is written in us terms and is an intermediate level you will need to know how to work the corner to corner crochet method materials 2 434 yards 4 skeins of lion brand respun bonus bundle in color a cider 2 303 yards 4 skeins of lion brand respun bonus bundle in color b raven crochet hook size g 4mm tapestry needle scissors tape measure size finished size is approx 60 x 72 this pattern is also available as a kit from lion brand yarn
